name: Send a new message on Microsoft Teams from a new response in Survey123
description:
Every time a new response is submitted in Survey123, a message containing response details will be sent to Microsoft Teams.

This template was created based on a survey with these questions:
1) Full Name
2) Email
3) Phone number
4) Describe your problem

You can use your own survey with different questions but you will need to update the mappings - especially in the message body.
